author: aandvalenzuela
body:
There are some igprof failures due to `Segmentation fault` in `CMSSW_12_4_X` [(Sample log)](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/jenkins/job/ib-run-igprof/32934/console).

I think we need to backport changes made in `CMSSW_12_5_X` by [#7910](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/7910) to `CMSSW_12_4_X` regarding libunwind (`igprof.spec` are already the same).
title: [Backport 12_4_X] Update to HEAD of libunwind master. Patch is no longer needed
